snippet: The move may be another indication that the bookstore chain will focus more intensely on its digital side and is willing to shed other assets.
abstract: The move may be another indication that the bookstore chain will focus more intensely on its digital side and is willing to shed other assets.
lead_paragraph: Barnes & Noble has put Sterling Publishing up for sale, nearly a decade after it bought the publishing house, a person briefed on the matter said Wednesday.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Said to Put Publishing House Up for Sale
